**ThesisFlow-AI** is an all-in-one research platform designed to accelerate your academic work:

🔍 **Research Explorer** - Multi-source paper discovery and literature review
📋 **Project Planner** - AI-powered task planning with Gantt charts
✍️ **LaTeX Writer** - Collaborative document editing with real-time preview
📄 **Data Extraction** - Smart PDF/document analysis and summarization
🤝 **Collaboration Hub** - Team workspace with real-time sync

Built for students, researchers, and academic teams who want to focus on thinking, not busywork.
